info.headline: Wind Advisory issued January 09 at 2:10AM PST until January 09 at 10:00PM PST by NWS Oxnard
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT FROM NOON TODAY TO 10 PM PST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Southeast winds 20 to 30 mph with gusts to 35 to 40 mph are expected. * WHERE...Portions of southwest California. * WHEN...From noon today to 10 PM PST this evening. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds will blow around unsecured objects and make driving difficult, especially for drivers of high profile vehicles. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects such as lawn furniture.
